description: This file is a C++ source file defining a class TDKB_TR181Stub that implements various methods to interact with device parameters via external C functions. It includes definitions for initializing, setting, getting, adding, deleting objects, and other operations related to device configuration management, primarily for testing and validation purposes.

classes.name: TDKB_TR181Stub
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with device parameters, including initialization, get, set, add object, delete object, and cleanup functionalities.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the stub, registering necessary components.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up prerequisites for the test module, such as registering the agent.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets or cleans up prerequisites after testing.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a device parameter based on the request JSON, populating the response JSON.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_Set(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the value of a device parameter based on request JSON and performs validation.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_AddObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds a new row to a specified table object.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_SetMultiple(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets multiple parameters at once from a list.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_DelObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Deletes a row from a specified table object.

methods.name: void TDKB_TR181Stub_SetOnly(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value without additional validation or apply logic.

methods.name: TDKB_TR181Stub * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: Factory function to create an instance of TDKB_TR181Stub.

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Cleans up resources; currently logs shutdown.
